long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It is a Time table with 6 day provide each two weeks (Week A and Week B)
7 days if you press expand
Go to Settings to Enter your TimeTable and save it.
/!\ It is not alto update (yet)
If you want to export your TimeTable, go to setting and go to export, copy all and save as you want.
To import exported timetables, go to setting and go to import, place the timetable text and click the Done button.

Update :
You can now view future timetable at the home page.
Fixed day shift.
You can Expand so you can get more space.
